entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EventSource logging to RateLimitingMiddleware #41266
    7.0-preview5
  • IIS tests that look at EventLog are flaky #41264
  • Personal access token support in Identity #41262
  • Best practice for a singleton route handler filter with Minimal APIs? #41259
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet watch hangs while a Time Machine backup is being run on macOS Monterey #41257
    Backlog
  • Performance on bursts of requests on IIS less than ideal and results in rejected requests #41255
  • Testing ASP.NET Core with trimming #41252
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • FromServicesAttribute not optional #20444
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support for route handler filters in minimal APIs issue #41188
    7.0-preview4
  • Double setting of Bound Variable when using EventCallback Async Await with HttpClient call #41217
  • Poor performance resolving tilde paths in Razor tags #41234
  • The Web Project Description Error ,OpenAPI OR OpenAI？ #39529
    6.0.x
  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.ClientCompressedUnary #41248
  • IIS Application Pool Recycle returns unexpected 503 #10117
    Discussions
  • Cannot build the project which reference to another project #41210
  • build fails for new WebAPI project after switching to TargetFrameworks (plural) #40577
    7.0-preview4
  • Hotreload does not show updated value from ViewBag #41220
  • Asp.Net Core Web App + Background Service + Web Api In Same Project? #41204
  • Random CSS class name generation #41227
  • Introduce Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #40676
    7.0-preview4
  • IContractResolver must be passed to ConversionResultProvider methods in JSON Patch library #16690
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Check in launchesttings.json from AzureAd.Website #41267
    area-security
  • Add MapGroup #41265
  • Improve abort handling #41263
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Place XML comment hrefs in see elements #41254
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security, 7.0-preview4
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • Capture target from delegates and MethodInfo #41253
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Fixed the window update hangs #41256
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview4
  • Use file-scoped namespace #41261
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove some legacy folders and add area-grpc, area-web-frameworks #41260
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41238
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Use handler directly in gRPC interop tests #41251
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview4
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-dataprotection, area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Flow IContractResolver through JsonPatch method calls #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Split KestrelTrace into multiple files #41245
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
